i.name: Runic Blade
i.description: Riven's abilities charge her blade, causing her basic attacks to deal bonus physical damage. Riven's blade may be charged up to three times and expends one charge per attack.

q.name: Broken Wings
q.description: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.

w.name: Ki Burst
w.description: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.

e.name: Valor
e.description: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.

r.name: Blade of the Exile
r.description: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.

i1.name: Runic Blade
i1.blurb: Riven's abilities charge her blade, causing her basic attacks to deal bonus physical damage. Riven's blade may be charged up to three times and expends one charge per attack.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Riven's''' blade gains a ''Charge'' for 6 seconds every time she uses an ability (stacks up to 3 times). '''Riven's''' [[basic attack]]s consume a ''Charge'' when available to deal {{as|{{pp|6|key=%|25 to 50|1;6 to 18|displayformula = 25%+5% at level 6, then+5% every 3 levels}} AD}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}}.
i1.description2: ''Runic Blade'' can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for {{as|100% {{critical damage|100|melee}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}.
notes: * ''Runic Blade's'' duration refreshes whenever ''Riven'' gains or consumes a stack.
* ''Runic Blade'' does not affect structures (charges are not consumed when attacking them).
* ''Runic Blade'' can be {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, or {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}.
* ''Runic Blade'' charges are not be consumed if ''Riven'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}} when landing the enhanced attack.
* ''Runic Blade'' charges do not proc against wards.

riot.name: Broken Wings
riot.description: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.
riot.tooltip:
Riven strikes out in front of her in a short line. This ability may be re-cast {{ e4 }} additional times.

1st and 2nd Use: Slashes forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to all units she comes in contact with.
3rd Use: Leaps forward and slams the ground dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and knocking nearby enemies up. This leap can cross unpathable terrain.

Riven will target the unit your cursor is hovering over, or if no targets are present, Riven will simply strike the direction she is currently facing.

q1.name: Broken Wings
q1.blurb: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Riven''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} towards the target nearest to the cursor or in the direction she is currently facing, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in front of her. ''Broken Wings'' can then be reactivated twice within the next 4 seconds, with the second cast refreshing the timer.
q1.leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|15 to 95}} {{as|(+ {{ap|45 to 65}}% AD)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|15*3 to 95*3}} {{as|(+ {{ap|45*3 to 65*3}}% AD)}}}}
q1.description2: ''Broken Wings' '' third cast damages all enemies around '''Riven''' in an expanded radius, and {{tip|airborne|knocks them up}}. Riven can cross terrain during this cast.
q1.description3: Each ''Broken Wings'' cast causes her next basic attack to occur more quickly. This is not considered a basic attack timer reset.
q1.effect_radius: {{tt|{{fd|112.5}}|Standard first casts range}} / {{tt|150|Standard final cast range}} / {{tt|{{fd|162.5}}|Enhanced first casts range}} / {{tt|200|Enhanced final cast range}}
notes: * ''Broken Wings'' uses a barrage system (can be cast multiple times within a given period at no additional cost)
** Each cast triggers {{nie|Spellblade}} and counts as a charge for {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* Since it's not considered a basic attack reset it does not count for {{ri|Hail of Blades}}.
* ''Broken Wings' '' third cast is the only one that can be used to go over impassable terrain.
** Dash distance can be extended when jumping over certain thick walls, for example the inhibitor one.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will only block the third cast.

riot.tooltip: Riven's sword emits a burst of runic energy that shocks nearby enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} <scaleAD>(+{{ f1 }})</scaleAD> physical damage and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

riot.name: Valor
riot.description: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.
riot.tooltip: Riven does a quick dash in the direction of your cursor and becomes shielded, blocking up to {{ e2 }} <scaleAD>(+{{ f1 }})</scaleAD> incoming damage for 1.5 seconds.

e1.name: Valor
e1.blurb: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Riven''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} in the direction of the cursor, {{sti|shield|shielding}} herself for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
notes: * ''Valor'' can be used to bypass player-created terrain ({{ai|Crystallize|Anivia}}, {{ai|Cataclysm|Jarvan IV}}) but not to go through walls.

riot.name: Blade of the Exile
riot.description: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.
riot.tooltip:
Riven's weapon surges with spiritual energy for {{ duration }} seconds, granting her {{ percentbonusad*100 }}% extra Attack Damage ({{ bonusad }}), increased Range on her damaging spells and attacks, and the ability to use Wind Slash once.

Wind Slash: Riven fires a shockwave that deals from {{ mindamage }} to {{ maxdamage }} physical damage to all enemies hit, increasing based on how much Health they are missing.

r1.name: Blade of the Exile
r1.blurb: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Riven''' transforms her sword for 15 seconds, gaining {{as|(20% AD) '''bonus''' attack damage}}, {{sti|range|75 '''bonus''' range}} on her basic attacks, increased range on {{ai|Broken Wings|Riven}}, and {{ai|Ki Burst|Riven}}, as well as becoming able to cast {{ai|Wind Slash|Riven}} once for the duration.
notes: * There is a 1 second cooldown before ''Riven'' can cast ''Wind Slash'' after activating ''Blade of the Exile''.
* The {{as|'''bonus''' AD}} is gained on cast and does not change for the duration.
